text: Balo -- ''he granthaprapta lokera, amadera madhye o tomadera madhye paraspara samajhothara majhe eso, yena amara allah chara ara karo ebadata karabo na, ara tamra sathe an'ya kichuke sarika karabo na, ara amara ke'u allah chara an'ya ka'uke maniba bale grahana karabo na.’’ Kintu tara yadi phire yaya tabe balo -- ''saksi thako, amara kintu musalima.’’
